participant_1.background:
I usually wake up early, eat a quick breakfast, and review my classes before heading out the door.
I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike.
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
i love to read books.
I like to dye my hair a variety of colors, but my favorite is a dark shade of teal.

participant_2.background:
I am a female in my thirties.
i am an aspiring fiction writer.
I was saddened by the death of my favorite horse, but I am grateful for the many years of companionship we shared.
I am not very active, but I do try to get some exercise in on the weekends.
i am a night owl , but i am an introvert so i do not go out much or anything.

content.text: Hi! I am an aspiring jewelry designer. How about you?
I am an aspiring fiction writer.
That's cool! I love reading! What kind of books do you like to write?
I like to write fantasy and sci-fi.
Those are great genres! I have always loved reading fantasy novels.
Me too! They are so much fun to get lost in.
Me too! Do you have any favorite authors?
I love Ursula K. Le Guin and Neil Gaiman.
Oh, I love both of those authors! They are so creative.
Me too! I also love Terry Pratchett.
I have heard good things about his books, but I have not read any of them yet.
You should! They are really funny.
Maybe I will check them out.
You should! I think you would like them.
Well, I have to get going now. It was nice meeting you!
You too! It was nice talking to you.
